name: Sideshow
tagline: Sideshow is a powerful javascript library which aims to reduce your user's learning curve by providing a way to create step-by-step interactive helps. Explain the features of your application, control your end-user's interaction with your UI, emphasize what you're explaining in each step by masking it. Just think! The sky is the limit!
